RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 85. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five Furlongs on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWISTED FILIGREE vied three wide outside a pair through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun two to three wide for home, dug in under a drive dueling with the runner up through the stretch to the wire, came in slightly nudging his main pace foe in the final jumps while gamely getting the nod for the victory. EL GRANDE O vied inside a pair through the turn before cutting the corner into upper stretch, dug in under a drive dueling with the aforementioned foe through to the finish, got nudged in the last strides to the wire while battling on game but was ultimately bested at the end. JIMMYTHETOOTH coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside early on and then just off the inside through the turn under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, angled three to four wide for home, dug in under a drive trying to lug in and committed to the wrong lead in upper stretch despite correction and kept on to the secure the show honors. DANCING MISCHIEF broke a half a beat slow, got coaxed along three to four wide in pursuit, continued three to four wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. TECH DUINN vied from the two path between foes, got shaken off inside the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired. SUBSCRIBED broke a half a beat slow, chased along the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside for home and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Jimmythetooth
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coax 2p 7/16, 3-4w upper, lug in, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: El Grande O
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied ins pair, cut corner, dueled str, nudged late, game, bested

ENTRY.NAME: Subscribed
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 slw, chased inside, coaxed 7/16, 2w 1/4, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Tech Duinn
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2p betw, shaken off ins 5/16, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Twisted Filigree
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3w outside pair, 2-3w uppr, dueled str, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing Mischief
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable and SGV Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 slw, coaxed along 3-4w in pursuit, 3-4w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 2 6F Inner turf CR: 81. Claiming Purse 62000. INNER TURF (UP TO $10,788 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $32,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ITSAKEYPER settled off the pace, moved closer late on the backstretch, drafted behind the leading trio under restraint while full of run in the two then three path on the turn, shifted four wide at the quarter-pole then was asked, rallied to the lead outside the furlong marker, shook clear into the final sixteenth and proved best under steady urging. WITH THIS VOW pressed the pace on the outside of two foes, drew even in the three path on the turn, took the advantage while asked into upper stretch, was headed by the winner approaching the furlong marker and was outfinished while clear for the place. TEMPERMENTAL settled at the rear under some urging, moved closer while inside on the turn, turned into the stretch in the two path then shifted three wide over heels, pursued the top two into the final furlong and was out-kicked while clear for the show. RUVIES IN TIME bumped with a rival at the start, set a joint pace on the inside of foes while in hand, was let out along the rail on the turn, dropped back into upper stretch and weakened. FORTY SMOOTH bumped with a rival at the start then was hustled, attended the pace in the two path while loosely between foes, vied in the two path while between rivals on the turn, dropped back into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Tempermental
ENTRY.OWNER: Imperio Michael Rodriguez Rudy R and Gurdon Andrew
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled some urging,closer ins turn,2p1/4,mvd out,out-kicked

ENTRY.NAME: Ruvies in Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,pace ins foes,in hand,let out rail turn,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Forty Smooth
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,hustled,pace btwn,2path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Itsakeyper
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,closer1/2,draft full of run 2-3p turn,4w1/4,rallied,clear

ENTRY.NAME: With This Vow
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside,vied 3path turn,led3/16,headed1/8,outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 105000. (UP TO $18,270 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Weight , 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter Since December 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Wil l Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOT FUDGE established the front from the get go and showed the way in hand three paths off the inside, tucked to the two path and was under a firm left grip appearing to want to get out through the turn, had a pair of rivals advance outside, the rider sneaking a peak back at the three-eighths, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths and got out floating six wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive edging away at the end to prevail. ROSEBUG four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the place honors. CHI TOWN LADY six to seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six to seven wide for home and kicked on belatedly to secure the show honors. MOVIE MOXY away awkwardly at the break, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. MOSIENKO broke out striking the off side stall at the start, chased five then four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch and weakened. OK HONEY six paths off the inside in pursuit down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn getting placed to coaxing midway, continued three wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Mosienko
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Rosebug
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Movie Moxy
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 2w 1/4p, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Ok Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Chi Town Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6-7w backstretch, 2p turn, coaxed 3/8, 6-7w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Fudge
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 3w, 2p turn, firm left grip, got out 6w uppr, edged away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 4 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Ti me Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIGHER QUALITY was hustled from the start, moved up under urging then was rated off the pace, came back under urging near the five-eighths pole, moved closer while four then five wide on the turn, chased the runner-up under a drive into the final sixteenth, gained on that foe late, took the lead three strides from the finish and won the head-bob on the line to narrowly prevail. ALCOOLS went to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside to the two path on the turn, spun three wide into the stretch then responded well when put to a right-handed crop, had the rider switch the crop to his left hand near the eighth-pole but didn't use it on that side then quickly went back to a right-handed crop, led desperately into the final sixteenth, was headed by the winner three wide strides from the finish then was out-nodded and denied while well clear for the place. TRUCULENT settled off the pace, raced inside early on the turn, angled three then five wide around the seven-sixteenths, came six wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response while best of the rest. MUSICAL HEART was taken up shortly after the start, tossed his head while taken up again outside the seven-eighths then altered out over heels, tracked outside from that point, was asked in the three to four path on the turn, made a bid near the three-eighths, dropped back into upper stretch and weakened. FOREVER WICKED dropped well behind the rest of the field, saved ground on the turn and failed to threaten. MUCHO SUNSHINE was hustled from the gate, stalked the pace on the outside then inside of a foe, chased in the two to three path early on the turn, moved to the four path while dropping back later on that bend, floated six wide into the stretch and had nothing left. ROYAL REALM angled to the outside early then was urged well back in the field, went five wide on the turn, was carried seven wide into the stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Higher Quality
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,mvd up,rated,ask5/8,gain 4-5w turn,chased,up late

ENTRY.NAME: Forever Wicked
ENTRY.COMMENT: well behind,inside turn,failed to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Realm
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled out early,urged outside,5wide turn,7w into lane,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Truculent
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,ins1/2,angled 5wide 7/16,6w into lane,best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Alcools
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace,ins-2path turn,3path1/4,responded,led past 1/16,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Musical Heart
ENTRY.OWNER: River Card Stable and Jacobson David
ENTRY.COMMENT: tkn up after brk,tkn up7-1/2,toss head,alter7/8,outside,3-4w,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Sunshine
ENTRY.OWNER: Shivmangal Lolita and Catalini Robert P
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,stalked,ins foe,chased,drop back 2-4p turn,6p1/4,retreat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 5 1 1/8M Inner turf CR: 101. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 105000. INNER TURF (UP TO $18,270 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80, 000. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Since December 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SKIMS (GB) rated two to three wide just off the pace, remained patiently handled until set down spinning three wide into upper stretch, rallied to split rivals a furlong out seizing command just inside that station, then edged clear to the finish. ATOMIC BLONDE (GER) was under a rating hold tracking the front from near the rear of the compact group, came under coaxing just off the inside at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, tipped out inside the eighth pole and offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors. CANISY rated two to three wide in closest aim of the leader, pulled her way to latch on that rival five furlongs from home, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths when MISE EN SCENE advanced inside, swung four wide into upper stretch issuing a challenge for command, dug in under a drive taking over the front narrowly and briefly before being headed by the eventual winner, then ran on to preserve the show honors. MISE EN SCENE (GB) tracked the pace along the inside in hand, got given a nudge at the three-eighths and advanced inside to bid for command with five-sixteenths to go, cut the corner on even terms for the front scraping the paint, dug in under a drive among a quartet latched on to the eighth pole and weakened in the late stages. STAR DEVINE (IRE) away well, raced three wide into the first turn showing the way, tucked to the two path through that bend before tipping back three wide down the backstretch, held a safe advantage through sensible splits unhurried and uncontested, had CANISY advance outside pulling her way to be heads apart five furlongs from home but still faced little pressure as that rival remained on hold as well, came under challenge for the initial time just past the midway point on the far turn as MISE EN SCENE advanced inside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole now under threat from flanking challengers, spun just off the inside into upper stretch let out for the drive, dug in and was collared nearing the eighth pole, then weakened through to the finish. PHAROAH'S HEART tracked the pace along the inside until tipped to the two path five furlongs from home, came under coaxing three wide at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Atomic Blonde (GER)
ENTRY.OWNER: Faust Michaela West Point Thoroughbreds and Winters Equine LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated ins, coaxed 2p 5/16, 2w 1/4p, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Mise En Scene (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Qatar Racing LLC and Judah Leora
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, advanced from 3/8, cut corner, dug in, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Canisy
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, up 1/8, headed, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Pharoah's Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, to 2p 5/8, coax 3w 5/16, 4w uppr, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Skims (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 2-3w, set down 3w upper, split foes, up ins 1/8, edged clr

ENTRY.NAME: Star Devine (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w 1st trn, rated 3-2w, let out 2w 1/4p, collared 1/8, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 6 6F Turf CR: 90. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter Since December 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Cla im Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Six Furlongs on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOP GUN GIRL switched to the outside of the leader near the five-eighths then tracked the pace, stalked in the three path on the turn, was given her cue near the five-sixteenths, pursued the leader into upper stretch, gained the advantage nearing the furlong marker, responded well under one tap of a right-handed crop outside the sixteenth-pole and held under a strong hand-ride to the finish. BREEZE EASY (GB) was taken up while last away and spotted the front a few lengths, angled in while taken under a snug hold at the rear, moved closer while inside to the two path on the turn, had room to the outside at the five-sixteenths but remained in behind two foes and waited, continued on hold to the quarter-pole then was roused in upper stretch, was guided in for room at the eighth-pole then bobbled, rallied along the rail in the final furlong and finished with good courage for the place. LADY MILAGRO broke in front then came inward just after the start, showed the way with a clear advantage, controlled the action in the two path on the turn, was asked near the quarter-pole then came under a drive in upper stretch, lost the advantage to the winner approaching the furlong marker and weakened but was clear for the show. VIOLENT VIXEN was taken up just after the start and spotted the front a few lengths, settled off the pace, was roused while two to three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. DERRYNANE settled comfortably off the pace, saved ground on the turn, was roused near the quarter-pole and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Top Gun Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: switched out 5/8,tracked,3p turn,ask5/16,lead1/8,responded,held

ENTRY.NAME: Derrynane
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, inside turn, roused 1/4, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Violent Vixen
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken up brk,settled,2-3p turn,ask3/8,4w1/4,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Breeze Easy (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable and Reeves Thoroughbred Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: tkn up brk,snug hold,ins-2p,wait5/16-1/4,mvd in1/8,bobbled,rally

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Milagro
ENTRY.COMMENT: came inward early,clear pace,2p turn,ask1/4,headed1/8,wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 81. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 1 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY MINE bobbled at the break and was bumped by JOLLY MISS JILL, who broke outwards, tipped out to chase seven paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking six then five wide through the turn getting placed to coaxing at the three-eighths, went eight wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong from home, then edged clear to the finish kept to task. ICY REPLY chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while running on safe for the place honors. CARBON got bumped at the start by TRY IT AGAIN, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled eight to nine wide into upper stretch and improved position to procure the show honors. MERAVIGLIOSO chased six then five wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung six wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong out, then weakened in the late stages. TRY IT AGAIN bobbled at the start and recovered inwards under coaxing bumping CARBON, showed the way in hand three then two wide, got set down taking the three path into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared a furlong out, weakened in the late going. MY GIRL JAL chased five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun three wide for home and weakened. LA AGUILILLA coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong out, then weakened in the final furlong. ALICE KRAMDEN hustled from the gate, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun three wide for home and tired. JOLLY MISS JILL broke out at the start bumping LADY MINE, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung four wide for home and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: La Aguililla
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 2w 1/4, bid, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Alice Kramden
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 8-9w upper, improved

ENTRY.OWNER: Arenas Marcelo Giangrande Salvatore and Giangrande Stefano
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, brk in, hustled st, in hand 3-2w, collared 1/8, wknd lte

ENTRY.NAME: Jolly Miss Jill
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Mine
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobble, bumped st, 7w early, 6-5w turn, 8w uppr, up 1/8, edged cl

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Reply
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, no match, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: My Girl Jal
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-6w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Meraviglioso
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 6-5w, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, bid, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 8 6F Inner turf CR: 90. Allowance Purse 95000. INNER TURF (UP TO $16,530 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. No n-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PLENTITUDE broke a half-step slow, was rated under a tight hold, drafted in the two path on the turn, shifted four wide while asked at the quarter-pole, chased the leader while inside of a foe into the final furlong, brushed with that opponent shortly thereafter, gained on the pacesetter late and got up under strong handling to narrowly prevail. Z FIRST was taken under a tight hold then stalked the pace on the outside, rounded the turn in the four path, was asked five wide into the stretch, chased outside into the final furlong, brushed with the winner shortly thereafter and finished willingly to get the place. SHOOTOUTTHELIGHTS was bumped at the start and forced out, went to the front while in hand then attended the pace under a tight hold, raced in the three path on the turn, regained the advantage at the quarter-pole then was put to a drive in upper stretch, led determinedly into the final sixteenth but was overtaken then lost the place while able to get the show. CANDLE broke out and bumped with a foe, settled off the pace, drafted in the three path going around the turn, came four wide into the stretch, droppped in while asked for her best near the three-sixteenths, pursued the vanguard in the final furlong and lacked the needed kick. PALACE GOSSIP showed speed while in hand, took the lead near the nine-sixteenths, vied along the rail on the turn, lost the advantage nearing the quarter-pole then spun three wide into the stretch and gave way. GAME THEORY broke in the air and was off a bit slow, settled at the rear, traveled three wide on the turn and was no factor. AWILLAWAY settled towards the back, saved ground on the turn, was roused near the quarter-pole and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Awillaway
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, inside turn, asked 1/4, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Plentitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated tight hold,2p turn,4p1/4,chased ins foe,brshd,gain late,up

ENTRY.OWNER: Brennan Niall J and Brennan Stephanie S
ENTRY.COMMENT: lead 4-1/2,pace in hand,rail turn,headed3p1/4,gave way

ENTRY.COMMENT: tight hold,stlkd outside,4p turn,ask5p1/4,chsd,brshd ins1/8,up2nd

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in air, off slow, at rear, 3path turn, no factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 9 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 95000. (UP TO $16,530 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000. Three Year Olds, 1 20 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUNSET LOUISE established the front and showed the way in hand three then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch and floated four wide straightened away, dug in under threat to the outside and held sway to the prevail. SACRED WISH seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths and advanced on the front, swung five wide into upper stretch, ran on to chase the winner home clear of the rest but was ultimately repelled to the end. JUST KATHERINE broke out at the start bumping AMITY ISLAND, chased five to six wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, offered up a bid through the latter portion of the turn and went five to six wide for home, kept on well clear of the rest for the show honors. WISHING ON A STAR five paths off the inside down the backstretch in closest aim of the leader, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, got shaken off nearing the quarter pole and went seven wide into upper stretch, then weakened in the stretch. GUNS N' GRACES chased four wide through to the three-eighths when placed to coaxing and tucked to the two path inside that station offering up a mild bid five-sixteenths from home, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired. SUSPENDED CAMPAIGN broke in at the start getting away last, chased sluggish growing quickly detached at the tail of the field while six wide, tucked four wide into the turn coming under coaxing with half a mile to go, went six wide at the head of the stretch and made no impact. AMITY ISLAND got bumped at the start by JUST KATHERINE, chased five wide down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and made no impact. SWOOP TO FINISH six paths off the inside down the backstretch in aim of the leader, tucked to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, folded, and was eased home to the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Wishing On a Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Guns n' Graces
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, tucked to 2p ins 3/8, bid 5/16, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Swoop to Finish
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w in aim, coaxed 2p 7/16, 6w upper, folded, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Just Katherine
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 6-5w, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Amity Island
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 5w, coaxed 3w 7/16, 4w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Sunset Louise
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 3-2w, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, dug in, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Suspended Campaign
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, sluggish 6w early, 4w turn, 6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Sacred Wish
ENTRY.OWNER: Black Type Thoroughbreds Swinbank Stables Adkisson Steve Dunn Christopher T and
ENTRY.COMMENT: 7w backstretch, 4w turn, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, ran on, repelled

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 10 6F Dirt CR: 77. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Pr eferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIMELY CONQUEST broke a half-step slow, was urged along off the pace, went around the turn in the two path, angled out while gaining in upper stretch, rallied to the lead outside the furlong marker then kicked clear and proved best under steady urging. MIM chased the pace on the outside then in the four path on the turn, pursued the leader in the stretch and was outfinished while able to get the place. NOLITA was bumped at the start then a bit slow into stride, raced towards the back under urging, moved out on the turn, reached the five path before the five-sixteenths, gained into upper stretch and was along for the show. BON ADIEU broke out and bumped with a rival, tracked the pace down the backstretch, chased in the three path going around the turn, was carried out in upper stretch and weakened. SHAMAN PRINCESS quickly sped clear, remained well clear while inside to the two path on the turn, shortened stride in upper stretch, was collared outside the furlong marker and tired. BIG HAZEL was urged along off the pace, went three wide on the turn and lacked the needed response. ECHO IN ETERNITY broke a step slow, moved out early, was urged along off the pace, went four wide on the turn and failed to threaten. MONTAUK MYSTIQUE broke a half-step slow, was urged along on the far outside, went five wide on the turn and was no factor. MAXING THE BANK brushed the inside of the gate at the start, dropped back under coaxing, saved ground on the turn and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Shaman Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear pace,ins-2path turn,collared nearing 1/8,tired
